title: Permanently Banned for 3rd Party Malicious Programs?
body: Just got permanently banned for using 3rd party malicious programs which I don't even have? Not even sure what sort of program riot has accused me of using, but I wouldn't even know how to install or use one, nor want to. Pretty fair ban, I can tell riot really investigates when they permanently ban someone.

replies.body:
Assuming you are telling the truth, more than likely you either shared the account with someone who used cheats (usually a booster or a**hole friend) or your account was compromised. 

In the case of the first, you aren't going to get the account back. 

In the case of the second, ticket support (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and explain the situation. They will ask you to secure your account (change your PW) and will ask you a whole bunch of ownership verification questions. Once the account is secure and ownership is confirmed they'll give the account back.
